THE PURE CC WOOD AND CCC

CC world just starts with the bless of World Creation of the PURE CC WOOD,

which can result in crystals and its seeds, the crystal seed can breed the next generation of CC wood.

All CC wood in CC world is the later generations of the PURE CC WOOD.

In the CC world, the number of CC wood is limited, and the number of crystals that CC wood can produce is also limited.

In each citizen map can only one CC wood or PURE CC WOOD exist, they all the source of crystal.

Both mysterious wood and wood can produce crystal and crystal can also be called CCC.

CCC the circulated currency in the world.

The total amount of CCC produced in the world is limited, 3 billion of CCC may be produced in total, which maintains the world operation.

Number of CCC obtained by citizen = Adding times * Spirit * Vitality * X

  • Tree of Cloud

  • Tree of Pool

  • Tree of Flame

  • Tree of Thunder

  • Tree of Earth

  • Tree of Veins

  • Tree of Stream

  • Tree of Wind

Bought the PURE CC WOOD and become CC creation angel

  • Become CC creation angel, each CC wood can gain 1/64 of trading fee of CC world, that is the 1.5625% of sustained return.
  • Priority to enter CC world, everyday only a small amount of activity can share more CCC each settlement cycle.
  • Gain 20 times of permanent crystal addition of the PURE CC WOOD.
  • The PURE CC WOOD can return to the state of crystal seed as a gift or sell to other CC citizens, but the title of CC world creation angel remains forever and can gain share sustainably.
  • The PURE CC WOOD produces crystal seed, which can breed the second generation of CC wood and has high value and can be sold to others.
